content.title: Cystic Adventitial Disease
content.definition: Rare non-atherosclerotic arterial condition characterized by mucin-containing cysts within the adventitia that compress the arterial lumen, most commonly affecting the popliteal artery.

symptoms: Young patient without atherosclerotic risk factors
clinical_presentation.ishikawa_sign: Disappearance of pedal pulses with knee flexion

cyst_excision.technique: Open surgical excision of adventitial cyst
